title: Introducing: Omoh
body: Almost certainly the first ever Colombian music featured on these pages, **Omoh**, from the country’s capital, Bogota, arrive with no information, aside from the beautiful artwork above, and a five track EP, titled St. Clara. Five, intimate, at times sparse, yet always beautiful love songs, what it perhaps lacks in top of the range production, it more than makes up for in heart. From the folk roots of _It’s Only You_, to the Daughter-esque EP highlight, _Both_, it’s a deeply personal and bewitching listen. Check out a couple of tracks below, and grab the full EP via [Bandcamp](http://omohmusic.bandcamp.com/releases). _I wish that we could grow together_ Follow our [Spotify On Repeat playlist](https://open.spotify.com/user/crackintheroad/playlist/1UB6gJIZpmiO0H2zmSbg02) for a selection of the current hottest tracks. St. Clara by Omoh St. Clara by Omoh [Omoh – Ocean’s Feast](https://vimeo.com/127986538) from [Omoh Music](https://vimeo.com/user40139801) on [Vimeo](https://vimeo.com).
